text: Eghtɨ ia koma Israelɨn itir darasi bar moghɨra, ia bizir kam gɨfogh! Kar Nasaretɨn gumazim Krais Iesusɨn ziamɨn gumazir ian damazibar tughav itim a ua dera. Gumazir kam a Iesus, ia a inigha ter ighuvim gafuzɨ, an aremezɨ God a gamizɨ a ua dɨkafi.(4:10) Gumazir okuruar kam, Judabar Kaunselba, merara Pailat (Romɨn gavman faragha zuir gumazim) mɨgɨa ghaze, a Iesus mɨsueghtɨ an ovengegh. Nɨ Luk 22:66 ko 23:5ɨn gan. Egha Iesus ovengegha gɨvazɨ, me gumazamiziba nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn an ikian me aghua.
